description:
Ikoma is the main protagonist and a young steamsmith who formerly made a living in Aragane Station working with steam engines. He and his friend, http://anidb.net/ch78934 [Takumi] developed a steam weapon called Tsuranuki Zutsu which Ikoma believes is the best way to fully destroy a Kabane. However, during a Kabane attack on Aragane Station, he got bitten and was forced to use metal (bolted onto his body) in order to control where the infection occurred. Fortunately, Ikoma was fast enough for his brain to resist the infection, so he became Kabaneri. Boarding the Koutetsujou in hopes of arriving to Kongoukaku to investigate the Kabane.
Source: Koutetsujou no Kabaneri Wiki
name: Ikoma
